name: PB Serum HA Medium
description: Dominant in Lipase. Designed for lipomas, double chin, and fatty cellulite.
short_description: The only recombinant enzymatic system currently on the market.
detailed_description:
Latest-generation enzymes.
Ready-to-use, easy-to-apply and minimally invasive device.

Active ingredients

Collagenase PB220 Lipase PB500 and Lyase PB72K*

*Enzymatic system with higher Lipase concentration.

Indications

Presentation designed for double chin, corporal adiposity and cellulite.

Benefits

It reduces the volume of adipose tissue, regaining the patient’s confidence.

Content

1 lyophilized vial of recombinant enzymatic system.
1 vial of restorative liquid.
1 syringe of HA2.0

name: Smartker Daily Radiant
description: Brightening and lightening action for dark spots and areas of excessive pigmentation & enzymatic treatment
detailed_description:
enzymatic treatment.

Active ingredients

Keratinase PB333

Smart Peeling effect, eliminates the excess of dead cells without causing irritation, improving the texture of the skin and promoting the penetration of other active ingredients. Suitable for sensitive skin.

Vitamin C (20%)

Great antioxidant power. Reduces the appearance of dark spots and stimulates the production of collagen, improving skin firmness. 

Indications

Dull skin.
Hyperpigmentation.
Treatment and prevention of first signs of aging.

Visible results

Removal of superficial dark spots.
More luminous and firmer skin.

Content

10 vials of lyophilized powder.

name: PB Serum HA High
description: Dominant in Collagenase. Designed for deep scars, fibrosis, and deep wrinkles.
short_description: The only recombinant enzymatic system currently on the market.
detailed_description:
Latest-generation of enzyme technology.
Ready-to-use, easy-to-apply and minimally invasive.

Active ingredients

Collagenase PB220, Lipase PB500 and Lyase PB72K*

*Enzymatic system with higher Collagenase concentration.

Indications

Presentation designed for scars and fibrosis.

Benefits

It acts directly on the fibrotic septum, improving the patient’s appearance and functionality.

Content

1 lyophilized vial of recombinant enzymatic system.
1 vial of restorative liquid.
I syringe of HA2.0

name: PB Serum HA Low
description: Dominant in Lyase. Designed for periocular region, heavy legs, and fluid retention.
short_description: The only recombinant enzymatic system currently on the market.
detailed_description:
Latest-generation enzymes.
Ready-to-use, easy-to-apply and minimally invasive device.

Active ingredients

Collagenase PB220, Lipase PB500 and Lyase PB72K*

*Enzymatic system with the same concentration of the three enzymes.

Indications

Designed for facial reshaping.

Benefits

It modifies tissue mechanisms to reshape and rejuvenate the patient’s face.

Content

1 lyophilized vial of recombinant enzymatic system.
1 vial of restorative liquid.

name: Novacutan BioPro
description: Volume & Lift. 3DVS technology for deep dermal hydration and volume restoration. Ages 35+

name: Smartker Daily Equilibrium
description: Excellent results in the treatment of acne-prone skin and for photo-aging of the skin.
short_description: Helps control acne breakouts and reduce blemishes.
detailed_description:
Active ingredients

Keratinase PB333

Smart Peeling effect, eliminates the excess of dead cells without causing irritation, improving the texture of the skin and promoting the penetration of other active ingredients. Suitable for sensitive skin.

Vitamin A

Keratolytic effect, sebum regulator and collagen synthesis stimulator. Outstanding active in the treatment of both acne and photo-aging.

Vitamin C

Anti-inflammatory and antioxidant action

Vitamin E

Antioxidant and moisturizing action

Indications

Acne breakouts

Contents

10 vials 

Acne scars
Photodamage

Visible results

Reduction of whiteheads, blackheads and pimples.
Improved appearance in acne scars.
Decrease in visible signs of photo-aging (uneven texture, rough and dull skin).

Content

10 vials of lyophilized powder.
2 vials with 20 mL of reconstitutive solution.
1 Applicator.
1 Adaptor.

name: Smartker Daily Extreme Firmness
description: Intensive enzymatic lifting and global anti-aging therapy.
detailed_description:
Active ingredients

Keratinase PB333

Smart Peeling effect, eliminates the excess of dead cells without causing irritation, improving the texture of the skin and promoting the penetration of other active ingredients. Suitable for sensitive skin.

Collagenase PB220

With a visible and long-lasting effect, it promotes the regeneration and synthesis of a new collagen network in the dermis, intensely firming the skin.

DMAE

Increases skin tone and firmness. Flash effect.

Vitamin C

Great antioxidant power. Reduces the appearance of dark spots and stimulates the production of collagen, improving skin firmness.

Hyaluronic Acid

Contents

10 vials

Contents

10 vials

Deeply hydrates the skin.

Indications

Facial sagging with loss of firmness and elasticity.
Irregular tone and imperfections.
Visible signs of aging in mature skin.

Visible results

Improved firmness and tone.
Reduction of wrinkles and visible aging signs.
Tightening and smoothing effect.
Young and luminous skin.

Content

10 vials of lyophilized powder.
2 vials with 20 mL ofreconstitutive solution.
1 Applicator.
1 Adaptor.

name: Novacutan YBio
description: Young Bio. HA + HOPAAB for "Beauty Flash", dark circles, and radiance. Ages 20+.

name: Smartker Daily Multivit
description: Sebum-regulating and revitalizing enzymatic treatment for oily and dull skin.
detailed_description:
Active ingredients

Keratinase PB333 

Smart Peeling effect, eliminates the excess of dead cells without causing irritation, improving the texture of the skin and promoting the penetration of other active ingredients. Suitable for sensitive skin.

Lipase PB500

Removes excess sebum from the surface of the skin and from inside the pores. Mattifying effect.

Vitamin B Complex (B1, B3, B5, B6)

Minimizes the appearance of enlarged pores, repairs the cutaneous barrier and balances moisture levels.  Antioxidant and antimicrobial effect.

Indications

Oily skin and acne prone skin.
Enlarged pores.
Blackheads & whiteheads.

Visible results

Contents

10 vials

Regulation of oily skin’s excess sebum production.
Reduction of blackheads and enlarged pores.
Matte and luminous skin.

Content

10 vials of lyophilized powder.

name: HA Partial Corrector
description: Partial Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity.
short_description: Partial Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity.
detailed_description:
Partial Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity. It is ideal for a visible and immediate solution of modulations and corrections derived from the application of HA fillers.

Active ingredients

Second generation hyaluronidase PB3000.

Indications

Designed for modulations and corrections:

Excess volume
Asymmetries
Tyndall effect (bluish colouring)
Oedema
Granuloma
Nodules
Biofilms

Benefits

Partial removal of hyaluronic acid fillers.

Content

1 lyophilized vial with 2 hyaluronidase ucat*   per vial

name: Novacutan SBio
description: Skin Lift. HA + HOPAAB (double conc) for fine lines, firmness, and skin-lifting. Ages 35+.

name: Slim+ (Lipase PB500)
description: The lipolytic engine. Contains Lipase PB500 for triglyceride hydrolysis and localized adiposity reduction.
short_description: Lyophilized intensive enzyme powder for conditioning the skin and maintaining its well-being.
detailed_description:
Ingredients

Mannitol, Sodium Phosphate, Lipase Disodium EDTA.

Directions for use

Add 5 ml of saline solution to the vial for reconstitution before the moment of use. Preparation for weekly applications. Each mixture contains the necessary quantity for individual applications on the abdomen and legs. Lightly massage the areas to be treated.

Content

10 vials of sterile lyophilized powder.

name: Smartker Daily Hyaluronic
description: Contains Low Molecular Weight HA. For deep hydration.
short_description: Moisturizing enzymatic treatment, wrinkle and expression line reducer.
detailed_description:
Active ingredients

Keratinase PB333

Smart Peeling effect; it eliminates the excess of dead cells without causing irritation, improving the texture of the skin and favoring the penetration of other active ingredients.
Suitable for sensitive skin

Hyaluronic Acid LMW 

Due to its small size, it penetrates into the deepest layers of the skin, intensely moisturizing and filling in wrinkles from the inside.

Indications

Wrinkles and expression lines.
Dry & dehydrated skin.

Visible results

Wrinkle reduction.
Moisturized skin with improved texture.

Content

10 vials

10 vials of lyophilized powder.

name: HA Total Corrector
description: Total Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity.
short_description: Total Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity.
detailed_description:
Total Filler Corrector is a second-generation recombinant hyaluronidase with lower immunogenicity. It is ideal for a visible and immediate solution of complications derived from the application of HA fillers.

Active ingredients

Second generation hyaluronidase PB3000.

Indications

Designed for complications such as:

Serious complications (ischemia and necrosis).
Dissatisfaction of aesthetic result.
“Start from scratch” - completely stripping fillers

Benefits

Complete removal of hyaluronic acid fillers

Content

1 lyophilized vial with 25 hyaluronidase ucat*

name: Smooth+ (Collagenase GHPB220)
description: The fibrosis solvent. Targets structural matrix using Collagenase GHPB220 for fibrous cellulite and scars.
short_description: Lyophilized enzyme intensive powder for skin texture improvement.
detailed_description:
Lyophilized enzyme intensive powder for skin texture improvement.

Ingredients

Mannitol, Sodium Phosphate, Disodium EDTA, r- Clostridium, Hystolyticum Collagenase G, r- Clostridium Hystolyticum Collagenase H.

Directions for use

Add 5 ml of saline solution to the vial for reconstitution before the moment of use. 

Contents

10 vials of lyophilised powder

name: Easy Touch Device
description: Micro-channeling stamp / twist-bottle system with gold-plated 0.5mm needles.

name: Drain+ (Hyaluronidase PB3000)
description: The hydraulic regulator. Utilizes Hyaluronidase PB3000 to manage fluid dynamics and edema.
short_description: Lyophilized enzyme intensive powder for conditioning and improving skin appearance.
detailed_description:
Ingredients

Mannitol, Sodium Phosphate, Disodium EDTA, Hyaluronidase.

Directions for use

Add 5 ml of saline solution to the vial for reconstitution before the moment of use. 

Content

10 vials of sterile lyophilized powder.

name: Lift+ (Collagenase + Vitamin C)
description: The firming specialist. Specialized formulation for skin laxity and dermal restructuring.
short_description: Intensive firming solution for improving skin elasticity with Vitamin C.
detailed_description:
Ingredients

Powder vial: Sodium ascorbate, Mannitol, r- Clostridium Hystolyticum Collagenase G, r- Clostridium Hystolyticum Collagenase H.

Reconstitution solution vial: Aqua, Sodium phosphate, Dimethyl MEA.

Direction for use

Reconstitute the content of the powder vial prior to treating the affected areas.  

Content

10 vials of sterile lyophilized powder.
